DOC.brief_summary: The objective trial evaluate effect Aquamin F alone combination glucosamine sulfate versus placebo symptom joint pain , stiffness immobility subject painful osteoarthritis knee . The following hypothesis test : ( Hypothesis 1 ) After 12 week treatment , subject take Aquamin F alone combination glucosamine sulfate significantly less joint pain , stiffness immobility compare subject take glucosamine sulfate alone placebo alone . ( Hypothesis 2 ) No significant difference see adverse event subject take Aquamin F , glucosamine sulfate , Aquamin F + glucosamine sulfate placebo .

Subjects follow blood chemistry measurement additional 12-week period specifically assess blood calcium level post treatment . All participant subject diet exercise regimen measurement include : WOMAC score ( pain , stiffness , mobility , total score ) , 6 Minute Walking Distances , active passive range motion measurement , DXA scan , blood chemistry , hematology , CRP level lipid profile well rescue medication diary measurement adverse event assessment .
